S.FORM: Sagaran i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Sagaran. u kasalumaluma' nu Sagaran sa, 195 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 698 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 662 ku tademaw, pakalatu 95 . u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 36 ku tademaw, pakalatu 5 . u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 89 , Rukai 2 , Bunun 1 , Amis 1 , zumazuma 1 . malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan
